voice.text: Deposit your money here in the safety of the Tibian Bank!
Any questions about the functions of your bank account? Feel free to ask me for help!

parameter.value: Welcome |PLAYERNAME|! Here, you can {deposit} or {withdraw} your money from your bank account and {change} gold coins to higher value ones or the opposite. I can also explain the {functions} of your bank account to you.
Good bye, and remember: entrusting us with your gold is the safest way of storing it!
